mapper.update:
update
ID=#{id},
MER_APPLY_NO=#{merApplyNo},
MER_NAME=#{merName},
MER_WITHOUT_PWD_SIGN=#{merWithoutPwdSign},
PAY_OPEN_FLAG=#{payOpenFlag},
MER_BUSI_TYPE=#{merBusiType},
CONTACT=#{contact},
CONTACT_TEL=#{contactTel},
CONTACT_MOBILE=#{contactMobile},
CONTACT_EMAIL=#{contactEmail},
MER_TEL=#{merTel},
MER_FAX=#{merFax},
MER_ADDR=#{merAddr},
MER_POSTAL_CODE=#{merPostalCode},
WEBSITE_CODE=#{websiteCode},
WEBSITE_NAME=#{websiteName},
WEBSITE_DOMAIN=#{websiteDomain},
WEBSITE_SCOP=#{websiteScop},
COMPANY_NAME=#{companyName},
EGAL_PERSON_NAME=#{egalPersonName},
EGAL_PERSON_ID_TYPE=#{egalPersonIdType},
EGAL_PERSON_ID_NO=#{egalPersonIdNo},
COMPANY_ID_TYPE=#{companyIdType},
COMPANY_ID_NO=#{companyIdNo},
ORG_DEPT_NO=#{orgDeptNo},
BUSI_LICENSE_ID=#{busiLicenseId},
APPLY_DATE=#{applyDate},
APPLY_STATE=#{applyState},
ANSWER_APPLY=#{answerApply},
PARENT_MER_NO=#{parentMerNo},
USER_ID=#{userId},
WF_ID=#{wfId},
WF_STATUS=#{wfStatus},
SUBMITTER=#{submitter},
SUBMITTER_NAME=#{submitterName},
SUBMIT_DATE=#{submitDate},
REVIEWER=#{reviewer},
REVIEWER_NAME=#{reviewerName},
REVIEW_DATE=#{reviewDate},
APPROVER=#{approver},
APPROVER_NAME=#{approverName},
APPROVE_DATE=#{approveDate},
AUDITOR=#{auditor},
AUDITOR_NAME=#{auditorName},
AUDIT_DATE=#{auditDate},
HEAD_AUDITOR=#{headAuditor},
HEAD_AUDITOR_NAME=#{headAuditorName},
HEAD_AUDIT_DATE=#{headAuditDate},
SUB_MCH_ID=#{subMchId},
EXTENSION_PARTY=#{extensionParty},
STATE=#{state},
MER_STATE=#{merState},
ALIAS_NAME=#{aliasName},
PROMOTER_NAME=#{promoterName},
PROMOTER_IPHONE=#{promoterIphone},
PROMOTER_DEPT_NO=#{promoterDeptNo},
PROMOTER_DEPT_NAME=#{promoterDeptName},
QRCODE_USR_WECHAT=#{qrcodeUsrWechat},
QRCODE_USR_ALIPAY=#{qrcodeUsrAlipay},
STL_ACCT_NO=#{stlAcctNo},
STL_ACCT_TYPE=#{stlAcctType},
STL_ACCT_NAME=#{stlAcctName},
BANK_ID=#{bankId},
BANK_NAME=#{bankName},
KEY_3DES=#{key3des},
MER_NO=#{merNo},
QR_MER=#{qrMer},
QR_CODE=#{qrCode},
QR_LIMIT_COUNT=#{qrLimitCount},
QR_VALID_TIME=#{qrValidTime},
QR_ORDER_NO=#{qrOrderNo},
ALIPAY_MERCHANT_ID=#{alipayMerchantId},
where ID=#{id}
